description: Try our easy to follow Sundae With Cake Croutons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sundae,Pescatarian,Strawberry,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Sundae With Cake Croutons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup leftover sponge cake, cut into 1.5 cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a small frying pan over medium-low heat until melted.
Add cake pieces and cook on both sides for 2 minutes or until just golden. Transfer to paper towel to drain.
Divide sorbet between 2 sundae glasses. Arrange toasted cake on top, drizzle with passionfruit pulp and top with strawberry slices to serve.
